title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 814.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 814.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this regulation is to implement the
requirements of State Finance Law, section 54(10)(h) which established a
competitive grant program for two or more municipalities to cover costs
associated with mergers, consolidations, cooperative agreements, dissolutions
and shared services. It directed the Secretary of State to adopt rules and
regulations to implement the program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19

814.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
